metadata.title: CVE-2021-47204 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: dpaa2-eth: fix use-after-free in dpaa2_eth_removeAccess to netdev after free_netdev() will cause use-after-free bug.Move debug log before free_netdev() call to avoid it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
